page.title: 05CONSERVATION
page.content: { A new hedgerow} Because of new houses a hedge was removed to give access for a new road.A Hedgerow was planted by Kenton School on the 17th May 1985.Each child in class one has a tree to take care of.We go up to the hedgerow about every fortnight to water and weed them.When we move on to a senior school other younger children will look after the hedgerow. { {Haydon Common { }Haydon common is a woodland area.Their are deciduous trees in it.They are all matured which means that the bigger trees strangle the little trees so it is only big trees that live in haydon common.A team are chopping down the big trees so that the little trees can grow.
